body.name: IUNIK Centella 70% Calming Gel Cream Vegan Non-Sticky Moisturizing Blemish Care w/Tea Tree 10% Soothes Acne, Rosacea, Oily & Sensitive Skin - Korean Plant-Based Hydration

features: 🌿 ALL DAY LONG HYDRATION: IUNIK centella calming gel cream is formulated with botanical ingredients such as centella asiatica leaf water, tea tree extracts, Niacinamide and adenosine. The moisturizer has zero irritating stuff and alcohol, in the formula. Providing all day and night-long moisturization. The facial lotion helps to hydrate and healthy skin. The hydrating formula will be absorbed deeply through the layer of skin in seconds without clogging pores or heavy feeling.

🌿 MOISTURIZES DRY SKIN and IMPROVE SKIN IRRITATION Centella Asiatica Extract, Tea Tree Extract well-known soothing ingredient that heals and strengthens the skin from irritation, and 6 Sprout Extracts (Pak Choi, Broccoli, Sprout Wheat, Clover, White Radish, and Cabbage)

🌿 CONTAINS 72% of CENTELLA ASIATICA Leaf Water instead of purified water for the maximum efficacy. This gel cream is suitable for all skin types and is ideal and especially effective for irritated and sensitive skin types.

🌿 SUITABLE FOR WIDER RANGE OF SKIN TYPE: The IUNIK moisturizer is free of "artificial or synthetic fragrance", hypoallergic and comedogenics. Iunik gel cream is suitable for women, men with dry, sensitive, normal & acne prone, aging and normal skin. This facial lotion is ideal to use in dry winter. The facial cream will leave a smooth & soft texture upon the layer of the skin.

🌿 CLEAN PROMISE: IUNIK Skin Care Products are formulated WITHOUT 1500+ Ingredients such as Parabens, Sulfates, Synthetic Fragrance, PEGs, Petroleum, and Formaldehyde releasors. Our products are certified cruelty-free and VEGAN.

Is this recommended for dry skin as well? Absolutely. Dry skin can also be sensitive and prone to breakouts. In this case, we recommend applying this gel cream first to soothe the skin, followed by a gentle but thicker moisturizer for extra hydration. Does this pill when worn under makeup? No - that's what makes a gel moisturizer ideal for wearing under makeup. It dries down quickly without a residue, but with an ever-so-slightly tacky texture that gives makeup something to grab onto and allows it to last longer. How do I know if this product is authentic? To ensure the legitimacy of the product, please make sure you are purchasing the product from CrediThink. The legitimacy of the product cannot be promised when purchased from other sellers than us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm enjoying this product. I have sensitive skin around my lips and nose which sometimes gets irritated by other products. This product didn't irritate at all and it hydrated my skin. It's unscented and lightweight which is perfect for summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Really Like This For Summer Skincare
reviews.reviewText: There doesn't seem to be any standardized definition of what a product will be like if it is sold as a "gel cream". I ordered three different gel cream products at the same time to try, including this one, and all three were vastly different from one another.Of the three I ordered, I like this one the most. It is most like a soft gel for sure, although not like a cream at all. It absorbs easily and doesn't stay sticky.I have eczema-prone skin, and the centella has become an ingredient that I really like. It is so soothing for me, as well as not creating further problems. After too much sun one time, it felt so good and really seemed to help! It even soothes the occasional inflamed acne spot.The texture and moisturization are perfect for summer months for me, when I don't have much issue with dry skin.I also like the way it is fragrance free, as far as I can tell.This is going to be on my regular rotation for summer skincare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I love the gel texture of this moisturizer. I basically use it for morning. It makes my skin so calm and soft. It does well even when I have pimples. No sting sensation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thing since Sliced Cheese (sorry bread)
reviews.reviewText: First off - thanks Hyram for the recommendation of this product. In less than a month, this has almost completely cleared my skin and helped prevent new acne.I have been trying everything for years to get rid of my constantly reoccurring adult acne along the cheeks and jawline. Nothing had worked even remotely close to this moisturizer. Acne is almost zapped away overnight, red spots have cleared, and the amounts of breakouts I have has decreased at least 90%.To start my routine, I use a oil cleanser (when I wear makeup) and follow up with a mild salicylic acid cleanser. I then use the Tea Tree serum from iUnik and then this moisturizer. Now, since it is winter where I live (freezing and dry) and since I have normal skin type that goes dryer in the winter and oilier in the summer, this moisturizer doesn't provide enough moisture for me, so I go in with a supplemental HA moisturizer as well.If you have oily skin, I think you will love this product and will not need to supplement with an additional moisturizer. It is a really lightweight formula that instantly gets absorbed by the skin. If you are on the dryer side, I would still recommend this product, but use it like a serum and then go in add an additional moisturizer.Do beware, with the recent reformulation some added fragrance is now on the list of ingredients. However, they are the last ingredients and I believe they are just there to lightly counteract the smell from the ingredient substitute that allowed them to eliminate silicone from the formulation. Frankly, you can't even smell it. Even with overly sensitive skin, I wouldn't worry that the fragrance will have too much of a negative impact. The other ingredients are so fantastic that they greatly outweigh the small amount of fragrance added.Overall, I'm so impressed by this product that I would recommend it over any other products available in the popular beauty stores like Sephora and Ulta.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Skincare is extremely important and frugal to me, and as a newbie I’ve been doing A TON of research, so this is going to be a loaded review that details just about everything I’ve learned about this product and how it works with other products. Hopefully it helps others who struggle with oily skin and acne breakouts.I’m 21 years old and live in a dry, desert climate, so I have oily yet dry skin, meaning that due to the dry nature of my skin, i produce excess sebum which causes oiliness and (newly) breakouts. I can’t express how important this information is when looking for skincare products!!! Don’t look at just the benefits of certain products, make sure you know your skin type and it’s sensitivities before purchasing!!I follow a 3-5 step skincare routine, using 3 main products daily, and occasionally using a toner or an exfoliant. I haven’t tried any serums or essences yet due to my skins acne prone nature and needing to learn how my skin reacts to products first— essentially, if you’re new to skincare, don’t dive right into a 5-10 step routine, make a foundation that addresses your primary concerns first and learn how your skin reacts to certain products.I’ve swapped through many products all read, from Klair’s Gentle Black Deep Cleansing Oil to Acewell’s Licorice pH Balancing Cleansing Toner, to Missha’s Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cream to Thank You Farmer’s SPF, and more, all of which did not help, despite being good products for others.The routine I currently run with is:Hanskin’s Pore Cleansing Oil BHAEtude’s Soon Jung pH 6.5 Whip Cleanser (which i may be swapping soon)and now Iunik’s Centella Calming Gel Cream+ the occasional Green Tea exfoliant and Apple Cider Vinegar homemade toner (important to do research before using ACV!!)This cream has been the absolute cherry on top. My double cleanse plus a moisturizer was doing okay, it was an improvement but i was still getting breakouts and having an oily sheen afterwards. Iunik’s Calming Gel has tied it all together into a neat little bow. It’s only been 3 days and my acne is already clearing up 10-fold. All of my pimples have broken down into tiny spots and are going away quickring than ever, I haven’t had any new breakouts yet and my skin doesn’t feel slick and greasy.The only thing I have to say is do not apply this in your bathroom after showering, the moisture in the air will cause it to absorb poorly and you will be left with your skin feeling tight and dry. Wait until the humidity in the bathroom has aired out and it isn’t so hot before applying this product. When applied correctly, it works great!I was going to give this 4 stars, as I still feel that there may be a bit more moisture to be desired, but it does as advertised and truly works. so I’m going to be testing out some serums and essences to find one that’s compatible with my new routine to get that extra moisture boost. If this product continues working the way it has these last 3 days, it will easily become a staple in my routine.But summary of all this, if you have skin like mine that isn’t very sensitive, but struggles with excess sebum and acne, this product will most likely work for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the gel texture. It dries down pretty quickly but doesn't leave me flaking or peeling or anything. It worked well for the first week or so, but I realized that it's making my skin itch for a considerable amount of time after each use. Perhaps I have an allergic reaction to the centella in it. It makes me sad that I will probably not continue using the product. I would say to try the product. It should do the job as long as you're not allergic. It didn't cause me any acne or anything, and I have sensitive oily skin.

I have combination skin and this product has been my holy grail for the past year or so. It's my second time buying this since my skin has improved so much after the first tube. This cream has moisturised the dry areas of my face and reduced the oiliness in my T-zone. It feels very light after application and doesn't leave any sticky residue at all. I've noticed significantly fewer breakouts too, which has been a complete blessing. I use this product everyday and it's lasted me for just over 6 months, so it's excellent value for money too!
Always coming back for this moisturiser, fragrance and alcohol and all that nonsense free, great for my oily skin after cleansing and toning
It’s looks like water and feels very light on the face, also not sticky. Leaves my skin feeling soft. I was a little unsure if it even worked at first but seems to be doing fine so far
It helped my acne go away
